items.title: #21 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Boise State Broncos: Staff Picks
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are back home for a GREEN OUT game against the Boise State Broncos. This is the first ever matchup between the two programs, and although BSU is a Group of Four school… Irish fans have been eagerly awaiting this game. It’s playoff football every week for the Irish moving forward, […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Boise State Broncos Q&A with Mountain West Connection
items.summary: Well folks, we can all breathe a sigh of relief (at least for now). Our beloved Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team has managed to pull themselves back to 0.500 with their 56-13 demolition of the Arkansas Razorbacks last week, putting the final nail in the Sam Pittman coffin. items.title: Notre Dame Football: Marcus Freeman updates the media ahead of Boise State
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are back home this weekend as they play host to the Boise State Broncos in a GREEN OUT game. The Irish are currently ranked #21 with a 2-2 record, while the Broncos are unranked with a 3-1 record. On Thursday, Marcus Freeman gave the media a few updates… INJURY REPORT […]

items.title: From Calculus to College Football: Wisdom That Lasts
items.summary: This weekend, Notre Dame faces the Boise State Broncos for the first time in history. There’s a special weight to those “firsts” — because they aren’t just another Saturday on the schedule, they’re a chance to write a new chapter in the story of Notre Dame football. For Boise State, it’s an opportunity to measure […]
